orego.play

Class ThreadedPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • orego.play.Player
      • orego.play.ThreadedPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Playable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    McPlayer

    public abstract class ThreadedPlayer
extends Player
    A player that runs multiple threads.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThreadedPlayer()
      A threaded player with n threads and no pondering.
